Room.Name: Arched Entry
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the arched entry reserved for high level mages who wish to train.
Room.LongDescription: level ten mages and above are considered the aristocracy in the Land of Mordor. This special entrance to the training room is reserved to those who will one day aspire to the council of mages at Lyanden castle. The training room floor is down below you, but you must be at least level 12 to go that way. If you are level nine, ten or eleven, go in the amethest door.
